Title: Authorizes certain owners of residential real property in the city of New York to opt out of planned city tree planting
Summary: Authorizes certain owners of residential real property in the city of New York to opt out of planned city tree planting.
LawCode: Add ยง28-b, Gen City L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to authorizing owners of certain residential real property, in the city of New York, to opt out of tree planting conducted by such city on adjacent city property
